title: Before You Start
body: To sign documents via Tradelink, please note:

notes.description:
You'll need a certified digital identity: iAM Smart or iD-One.
Not sure which one to choose? View here for a quick comparison and application steps.
You must register using the same email you used for T+, which will be auto-filled when you proceed.
Once registered, your T+ and DMSS account will be connected for seamless future sign-ins.

warning: If you register DMSS using iAM Smart, SSO will not be available.
